name: Lil Reaper's Training
description:
Made this game for GameDev.TV game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022 

It's your first day as a reaper and you need to gather as many souls as possible!
But watch out, the ghosts are mad so don't let them touch you! Use your scythe to harvest them and send them to a peaceful afterlife!

Controls:
WASD or Joystick
(movement also controls the scythe)

Made in Unity, link to Github source code: https://github.com/drewhsu86/Lil-Reaper-Training
